resources.string: Automatically switch to a preferred network when both the Wi-Fi network and mobile network are available.
When a Wi-Fi network is detected to have poor connection quality, the mobile network will be used instead. When turned off, the Wi-Fi connection will be prioritised.

Predict network conditions by analysing Wi-Fi signal data. If poor Wi-Fi network quality is expected, this will automatically switch to a mobile network. Wi-Fi connection will be prioritised for home network use.
